name: Space Wall
description:
A challenging and beautiful puzzle game.
Rotate the form and find the correct direction, to go cross Space Wall!

Now we are in a journey to some different dimensions. What you need to do is to find the path using your abstract thinking. And the only key is the form on your palm.
Rotate it to suitable direction, otherwise, you may miss in this mysterious space, forever...

Features:
- 10 Worlds: Explore all these worlds in their different atmosphere. And discover the form hidden in each;

- Activate your brain: Try your best to remember and imagine the shape of all forms, use your abstract thinking to travel further;

- Unique sounds: All well-organized music and sound effects, make you immersing in this miracle space. Make sure wear an earphone to enjoy a full experience.
